describe: North Macedonia is a landlocked country in Southeast Europe, known for its rich history, diverse culture, and stunning natural landscapes. It is a part of the Balkan Peninsula and has a mix of mountainous terrain and picturesque lakes.

cities.name: ğŸŒ‰ Skopje
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northern part of the country, along the Vardar River.
cities.climate: Skopje has a continental climate with hot summers and cold, snowy winters.

cities.name: ğŸ° Ohrid
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the northeastern shore of Lake Ohrid.
cities.climate: Ohrid has a Mediterranean climate with warm, dry summers and mild, wet winters.
popular_attractions: Church of St. John at Kaneo

cities.name: ğŸŒ³ Bitola
cities.geographical_location: Located in the southwestern part of the country, near the Pelister National Park.
cities.climate: Bitola experiences a temperate climate with warm summers and cold winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Selsko Meso, Turli Tava, and Mastika.
